original_text: These people lived by the sea. They lived in groups. Each group went to live in a different place. Each group spoke its own language.
korean_text: 이들로부터 여러 나라 백성으로 나뉘어서 각기 언어와 종족과 나라대로 바닷가의 땅에 머물렀더라

sentences.original_text: These people lived by the sea.
Each group went to live in a different place.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 무리는 다른 곳에 살러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Each group spoke its own language.
